text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's almost time for tryouts, where<n>Umamusume show
potential trainers<n>what they're capable of.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the day draws closer, runners<n>devote themselves to
nonstop training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But there is one among them who<n>decides on an entirely
different<n>approach to preparing.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Come one, come all. Tonight, the<n>world shall witness T.M.
Opera O's<n>glorious road to victory.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
What could one call an act so bold?<n>"T.M. Opera O, Prelude
to the Crown!"<n>...is how it will be known.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh. From the name alone, it is sure<n>to be unrivaled in
beauty and passion!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I imagine what will come, and hark! I<n>can already hear the
fanfare of<n>angels, ringing from the heavens!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Now, all that's left is to wait for the<n>audience to arrive, but...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm, everyone must be<n>preoccupied with training. There<n>
aren't many passersby at all.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That student is talking in the middle of<n>an empty plaza.
She's rather...<n>different than the other racers.
choice_data_list: (What in the world is she doing?)
(What in the world is she doing?)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just as I'm thinking this to myself,<n>our eyes meet.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ahhh! You there! Welcome and well<n>met!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you needn't say a word. I<n>know you've come to see
my most<n>epic performance.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: How could you resist? I am thelibrettist! I am the director! AndI am the star! Gifted with asplendid cast—namely, me—it shall bethe greatest opera of all time!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Please, take your seat on that bench<n>there. Ahem, attention
please. The<n>show will now begin.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's wrong?
choice_data_list: What do you mean you're performing an opera?
What do you mean you're performing an opera?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh... It's simple, really.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Listen well. In three days' time, I will<n>run in the tryouts. It is
to be a grand<n>event, with much of the academy in<n>
attendance.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And thus, I'm here performing a<n>stunning overture to
celebrate its eve.<n>My opera will stir talk of the race into<n>a
tempest of excitement!
choice_data_list:
But wouldn't the "eve" of the race be the day
before?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: My, what a peculiar thing to claim.Who decided that the eve mustbe exactly one day before?
choice_data_list: You know, like, the definition of the word...
You know, like, the definition of the word...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Again, who ever said thatwords be restricted to theirdefinitions?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: To be shackled by common sense is<n>entirely nonsensical.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Why you ask? For I am king amongkings! That is why I have beendubbed the Centurial Overlord!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And so, what does it matter to an<n>overlord whether the eve
is one or<n>three days before? Heh, do you<n>finally
understand?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hm, appreciation for the fine artsis an acquired taste. You'll getthere eventually.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Worry not—I nonetheless welcome<n>you as first to bear
witness to my<n>show.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My phenomenal performance will live<n>in your soul for
eterni—hm?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hold for a moment. That pin,<n>glimmering in the midday
sun—is it not<n>a trainer badge?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh... Haha... Ahahaha! Haaah ha ha<n>ha!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Perfect! I am at this very moment inneed of a trainer! For I shall soonbe speeding down the road to victory!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
This is nothing less than fate! As<n>someone so utterly
captivated by my<n>opera, you'll be most fitting for the<n>job!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Do not be shy—take my hand! Come<n>now!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Ah, I see. You are reluctant to<n>claim such a highly
esteemed role for<n>yourself.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I understand your deep feelings about<n>it. I, too, become
overwhelmed<n>whenever I look myself in the mirror.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And so, I offer this amazing<n>suggestion. Become my
provisional<n>trainer in order to steel thy will.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
We can determine our compatibility<n>before the tryouts this
way!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I shall neither run nor hide. Take all<n>the time you need to
acclimate to my<n>glorious presence!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha! The curtains now<n>rise on my triumph, fair
trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I try to reason with the imposing<n>student over and over, but
she just<n>won't listen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So now I find myself in the awkward<n>position of being T.M.
Opera O's<n>provisional trainer...
